entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Richmond Hill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:37 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Buttonville Municipal Airport 6:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: W 30 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to periods of rain or drizzle overnight. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
